info.name: KelolaAja Backend API
info.description:
Complete API collection for KelolaAja Backend - ERP System

Base URL: http://localhost:8080/api/v1

Default Credentials:
- Admin: admin@kelolaaja.com / admin123
- Editor: editor@kelolaaja.com / admin123
- Viewer: viewer@kelolaaja.com / admin123

body.raw:
{
  "fullName": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "+628123456789",
  "companyName": "Acme Corporation",
  "message": "Saya tertarik dengan produk KelolaAja",
  "source": "website"
}

{
  "jobCode": "DEV-001",
  "slug": "senior-backend-developer",
  "department": "Engineering",
  "jobType": "FullTime",
  "jobLevel": "Senior",
  "workLocation": "Hybrid",
  "city": "Jakarta",
  "country": "Indonesia",
  "salaryMin": 15000000,
  "salaryMax": 25000000,
  "salaryCurrency": "IDR",
  "salaryPeriod": "monthly",
  "showSalary": true,
  "positions": 2,
  "experienceYears": 5,
  "applicationDeadline": "2024-12-31T23:59:59Z",
  "isActive": true,
  "isFeatured": true,
  "publishedAt": "2024-11-27T00:00:00Z",
  "translations": [
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "title": "Senior Backend Developer",
      "shortDescription": "Kami mencari Senior Backend Developer berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim Engineering kami",
      "description": "Kami mencari seorang Senior Backend Developer yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim Engineering kami. Posisi ini akan bertanggung jawab untuk mengembangkan dan memelihara backend services yang scalable dan reliable.",
      "qualifications": "- Minimal S1 di bidang Computer Science atau setara\n- Pengalaman minimum 5 tahun sebagai Backend Developer\n- Strong problem-solving skills",
      "additionalInfo": "Benefit tambahan: BPJS Kesehatan, Asuransi Swasta, Laptop, WFH Allowance"
    },
    {
      "locale": "en",
      "title": "Senior Backend Developer",
      "shortDescription": "We are looking for experienced Senior Backend Developer to join our Engineering team",
      "description": "We are seeking an experienced Senior Backend Developer to join our Engineering team. This role will be responsible for developing and maintaining scalable and reliable backend services.",
      "qualifications": "- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent\n- Minimum 5 years of experience as Backend Developer\n- Strong problem-solving skills",
      "additionalInfo": "Additional benefits: Health Insurance, Company Laptop, WFH Allowance"
    }
  ],
  "requirements": [
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "requirement": "Minimal 5 tahun pengalaman backend development",
      "isRequired": true,
      "displayOrder": 1
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "requirement": "Mahir dalam Node.js, TypeScript, dan PostgreSQL",
      "isRequired": true,
      "displayOrder": 2
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "requirement": "Pengalaman dengan RESTful API dan microservices architecture",
      "isRequired": true,
      "displayOrder": 3
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "requirement": "Familiar dengan Docker dan Kubernetes",
      "isRequired": false,
      "displayOrder": 4
    }
  ],
  "responsibilities": [
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "responsibility": "Mengembangkan dan memelihara backend services yang scalable",
      "displayOrder": 1
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "responsibility": "Berkolaborasi dengan tim frontend dan product",
      "displayOrder": 2
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "responsibility": "Code review dan mentoring junior developers",
      "displayOrder": 3
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "responsibility": "Optimasi performance dan monitoring aplikasi",
      "displayOrder": 4
    }
  ],
  "benefits": [
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "benefit": "Asuransi Kesehatan",
      "description": "BPJS Kesehatan dan Asuransi Swasta untuk karyawan dan keluarga",
      "iconName": "health",
      "displayOrder": 1
    },
    {
      "locale": "id",
      "benefit": "Flexible Working Hours",
      "description": "Jam kerja fleksibel dengan hybrid working arrangement",
      "iconName": "clock",
      "displayOrder": 2

    {

      "displayOrder": 3

    {

      "benefit": "Performance Bonus",
      "description": "Bonus tahunan berdasarkan performance",
      "iconName": "star",
      "displayOrder": 4
    }
  ]
}

formdata.value: I am very interested in the Senior Backend Developer position at your company. With 5 years of experience in backend development using Node.js and TypeScript, I believe I can contribute significantly to your team.

request.description: Submit job application with CV upload. All communication with candidate (feedback, interview schedule, etc.) will be done MANUALLY via email/phone by HR.
Get application detail. HR will use applicantEmail and applicantPhone from this response to contact candidate manually.

Update application after HR manually contacts candidate. HR will:
1. Review application in admin panel
2. Copy applicantEmail from response
3. Send email manually to candidate
4. Update status here after sending email
Update to Interview status. interviewedAt timestamp will be auto-set.
Reject application. rejectionReason can be used as template for manual email to candidate.
